ygData.subject: Re: Our spells
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a GREAT idea.  Falls right in line with our other wizardly spells in EQ, and something that would make us a much greater asset to a party.  Send a
ygData.messageBody:
This is a GREAT idea. Falls right in line with our other wizardly spells in
EQ, and something that would make us a much greater asset to a party. Send
a feedback in game on this, and I will do the same.

-Solric of the 4th circle.


-----Original Message-----
From: Jay Hollums [mailto:jhollums@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 16, 1999 8:56 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Our spells


I came up with another one too...

5th or 6th circle (16th or 20th level)

Tap Affinity
cast time: same as gate
target: any pc in your group
effect: Target is teleported to his last bind point.



-----Original Message-----
From: Wizard < wizard@... <mailto:wizard@...> >
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <mailto:eq_wizards@onelist.com> <
eq_wizards@onelist.com <mailto:eq_wizards@onelist.com> >; _
eq_magic@onelist.com <mailto:eq_magic@onelist.com> <_ eq_magic@onelist.com
<mailto:eq_magic@onelist.com> >
Date: Saturday, May 15, 1999 5:14 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Our spells


At 16.22 14/05/99 -0700, you wrote:


I had a really cool idea for a spell. I don't know if it could be
appropriate for wizards but maybe enchanters and magicians (unless they
already have this?)

you cast a spell that creates a double of yourself. Now, when you cast, your
double casts in stead of you. for balance reasons it could only last so
long, and when it suddenly disappears the monster(s) catch on and attack
you. the duration should only be about 30 seconds.

any thoughts... i'm going to send it in as feedback right now so any
suggestions would be appreciated



nice spell idea i like it
